analysis.key_quote: This change is nothing more than a blatant attempt to get rid of government employees trying to stand up FOR DEMOCRACY to an overreaching, law-breaking executive branch usurping Congress' power of the purse and more.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of protecting federal employees and the existing mechanisms for addressing poor performance and misconduct. It raises concerns about politicization and the undermining of democratic processes, which aligns with a stance against the rule.
